leter 039.jpg name scott james edman am from papal new guinea  am in love with Congolese of DRC refugee girl for 3 years ;she meet another man and fall in love and start misbehaving before i say a word she want court complaining and am was arrested charge with criminal       for 3 yrs am taking care of her buying .food ,cloth and money as wife to be i have never offed her  .name is ILLUNGA THERESE MASANGO  and her daughter KAIGI KAMOGO +27763725788 ASYLUM No PTA CODOO420109 
case no 1/1/18 --- 14 17 / 2011 case NO 2  file no DOCUMENT ON TOUP   in this case i loss my green card of u,s,a and other travel document and was release  without  .today the law says they commit (  PERJURY )  against UN  and south Africa law .i do not have opportunity  because L HR  supporting  this woman and her daughter .here they love women more than man but i have purpose to enlighten those who are in spirit  so that they can wake up and
help me  i do not have privilege or freedom of speech or power to support
 myself  i live in the park on handout on street corners in town , the most things is the  Congolese planing to kill me and the worst is she walking  round with protection order
saying she  want resettlement in  Australia  .u,s,a . UK  Canada 
How can she need resettlement where she got no love to balance
 perfection  all she do is for criminal love which  country can overcome
steer person whom got no GOD and direction ,repent and respect
  where people are  pls help us to stop this criminal  mortgager
 almoner accuser of brethren to live with good people thanks Scott
